ANDS-Grants.description: The project will deliver a general methodology for developing formal logical specifications of the Acts of Parliament for many common systems for counting votes in preferential elections. The project will deliver corresponding computer programs to count votes according to these systems and will deliver formal independently checkable proofs that the programs meet their specification. Such formally verified computer programs provide a legally sound basis for counting votes by computer. The methodology will also allow electoral commissioners to improve the natural language descriptions of the relevant Acts of Parliament which are often woefully out of date with current practice.
ANDS-Grants.title: Discovery Projects - Grant ID: DP140101540
